meanings.definition: Having branches or stems that grow in a lateral direction from a main axis.
meanings.sent1: The sympodial plant had branches spreading out sideways from its main stem.
meanings.sent2: The gardener admired the sympodial tree with its lateral growth pattern.
meanings.sent3: The sympodial shrub looked like it was doing a sideways dance in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts took a sympodial turn, branching out in different directions.
meanings.sent5: The sympodial structure of the bush made it easy to spot in the forest.
